name: worker-integrated-test
description: A sample Cloudflare worker demonstrating tests with Jest and Wrangler

scripts.test: concurrently --success first --kill-others "wrangler dev" "wait-on -d 5000 -t 30000 http-get://127.0.0.1:8787 && node --experimental-vm-modules node_modules/.bin/jest --coverage"

author: Paolo Tagliaferri <me@paolotagliaferri.com>
